languages.text: "Я помню, во имя чего мне дарован священный Патент. Я помню, чьей рукой мне указано быть. Я верю, и вера моя — светоч... А вот ваша — потухшие угли. И когда я гляжу на вас, мне стыдно за себя".

"I remember in whose name the sacred Warrant was granted. I remember by whose hand I am ordained to exist. I believe, and my faith is a bright light driving back the darkness. But your faith is cold embers, and when I look at you, I feel ashamed of myself."
languages.original_text: "Я помню, во имя чего мне дарован священный Патент. Я помню, чьей рукой мне указано быть. Я верю, и вера моя — светоч... А вот ваша — потухшие угли. И когда я гляжу на вас, мне стыдно за себя".

traits.locale_text: "I remember in whose name the sacred Warrant was granted. I remember by whose hand I am allowed to be. I believe, and my faith is a bright light driving back the darkness. But your faith is cold embers, and when I look at you, I feel ashamed of myself."
traits.speaker: RTFaithFemale

traits.locale_text: "I remember in whose name the sacred Warrant was granted. I remember by whose hand I am allowed to be. I believe, and my faith is a bright light driving back the darkness. But your faith is cold embers, and when I look at you, I feel ashamed of myself."

traits.locale_text: "I remember in whose name the sacred Warrant was granted. I remember by whose hand I am ordained to exist. I believe, and my faith is a bright light driving back the darkness. But your faith is cold embers, and when I look at you, I feel ashamed of myself."
traits.speaker: RTFaithFemale

languages.text: « Je me rappelle au nom de qui la lettre de marque m'a été accordée. Je me rappelle à quelle main je dois d'exister. Je crois, et ma foi est une lumière brillante qui repousse les ténèbres, tandis que la vôtre n'est que braises froides. Lorsque je vous regarde, j'ai honte de moi. »
languages.original_text: "I remember in whose name the sacred Warrant was granted. I remember by whose hand I am ordained to exist. I believe, and my faith is a bright light driving back the darkness. But your faith is cold embers, and when I look at you, I feel ashamed of myself."

traits.locale_text: « Je me rappelle au nom de qui la lettre de marque m'a été accordée. Je me rappelle à quelle main je dois d'exister. Je crois, et ma foi est une lumière brillante qui repousse les ténèbres, tandis que la vôtre n'est que braises froides. Lorsque je vous regarde, j'ai honte de moi. »
traits.speaker: RTFaithFemale

languages.text: «Yo recuerdo en nombre de quién me fue concedida la Patente. Recuerdo por la gracia de quién se me ordena existir. Creo firmemente y mi fe es una luz brillante que rechaza la oscuridad. Tu fe no son más que unas ascuas frías. Me doy vergüenza».
languages.original_text: "I remember in whose name the sacred Warrant was granted. I remember by whose hand I am ordained to exist. I believe, and my faith is a bright light driving back the darkness. But your faith is cold embers, and when I look at you, I feel ashamed of myself."

traits.locale_text: «Yo recuerdo en nombre de quién me fue concedida la Patente. Recuerdo por la gracia de quién se me permite existir. Creo firmemente y mi fe es una luz brillante que rechaza la oscuridad. Tu fe no son más que unas ascuas frías. Me doy vergüenza».
traits.speaker: RTFaithFemale

languages.text: “因为我没有忘记神圣的授状是以谁的名义授予我的。我记得我侍奉的主人是谁，我相信神皇。我的信仰是驱散黑暗的光明，而你的信仰不过是冰冷的余烬罢了。当我看着你的时候，我替我自己感到羞愧。”
languages.original_text: "I remember in whose name the sacred Warrant was granted. I remember by whose hand I am ordained to exist. I believe, and my faith is a bright light driving back the darkness. But your faith is cold embers, and when I look at you, I feel ashamed of myself."

traits.locale_text: “因为我没有忘记，神圣的许可证是以谁的名义授予我的。我记得我侍奉的主人是谁，我相信神皇。我的信仰是驱散黑暗的光明，而你的信仰不过是冰冷的余烬罢了。当我看着你的时候，我替我自己感到羞愧。”
traits.speaker: RTFaithFemale

languages.text: 「私は、誰の名において神聖な令状が付与されたのかを覚えている。私は誰の手によって自分が存在するように定められたのかを覚えている。私は信じているのだ。私の信仰は、暗闇を追い払う明るい光だと。しかし、お前たちの信仰は冷たき炎だ。お前たちを見ると、自分自身を恥ずかしく思う」
languages.original_text: "I remember in whose name the sacred Warrant was granted. I remember by whose hand I am ordained to exist. I believe, and my faith is a bright light driving back the darkness. But your faith is cold embers, and when I look at you, I feel ashamed of myself."

traits.locale_text: 「私は、誰の名において神聖な令状が付与されたのかを覚えている。私は誰の手によって自分が存在するように定められたのかを覚えている。私は信じているのだ。私の信仰は、暗闇を追い払う明るい光だと。しかし、お前たちの信仰は冷たき炎だ。お前たちを見ると、自分自身を恥ずかしく思う」
traits.speaker: RTFaithFemale

languages.text: "Ich erinnere mich, in wessen Namen der heilige Handelsbrief gewährt wurde. Ich erinnere mich, durch wessen Hand ich existieren darf. Ich glaube, und mein Glaube ist ein helles Licht, das die Dunkelheit zurücktreibt. Doch Euer Glaube besteht aus kalter Glut, und wenn ich Euch ansehe, schäme ich mich für mich selbst."
languages.original_text: "I remember in whose name the sacred Warrant was granted. I remember by whose hand I am ordained to exist. I believe, and my faith is a bright light driving back the darkness. But your faith is cold embers, and when I look at you, I feel ashamed of myself."

traits.locale_text: "Ich erinnere mich, in wessen Namen der heilige Handelsbrief gewährt wurde. Ich erinnere mich, durch wessen Hand ich existieren darf. Ich glaube, und mein Glaube ist ein helles Licht, das die Dunkelheit zurücktreibt. Doch Euer Glaube besteht aus kalter Glut, und wenn ich Euch ansehe, schäme ich mich für mich selbst."
traits.speaker: RTFaithFemale

languages.text: "Kutsal Ruhsatname'nin kimin adına verildiğini hatırlıyorum. Yetkilerimin kimin elinden geldiğini hatırlıyorum. İnanıyorum. İnancım, karanlığı iten ışığı getiriyor. Fakat senin inancın soğumuş, sana bakınca kendimden utanıyorum."
languages.original_text: "I remember in whose name the sacred Warrant was granted. I remember by whose hand I am ordained to exist. I believe, and my faith is a bright light driving back the darkness. But your faith is cold embers, and when I look at you, I feel ashamed of myself."
